resources.string: Maybe do a bit of reviewing, but do not stress about it. Too much last-minute cramming will agitate you.

Test taking can be stressful. All the material you have to learn, all the rules you have to follow, all the pencils, pens, calculators. Stress can take a toll on you. Your mental attitude going into that exam is as important as learning that material. Go into that test strong. Following these tips can help you relax for the big day!
